Title: Memoirs of an Invisible Man
Overview: After a freak accident, an invisible yuppie runs for his life from a treacherous CIA official while trying to cope with his new life.
Tagline: An adventure like you've never seen.
production_companies: Regency Enterprises, Alcor Films, Canal+, Warner Bros., Cornelius Productions
Cast: Chevy Chase, Daryl Hannah, Sam Neill
